data.eml:eml: Two new species of Turleania McLaughlin, 1997 (Crustacea: Decapoda: Anomura: Paguridae) from the Ryukyu Islands, southwestern Japan, and a redescription of T. balli (McLaughlin & Haig, 1996)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Osawa, Masayuki, Fujita, Yoshihisa (2008): Two new species of Turleania McLaughlin, 1997 (Crustacea: Decapoda: Anomura: Paguridae) from the Ryukyu Islands, southwestern Japan, and a redescription of T. balli (McLaughlin & Haig, 1996). Zootaxa 1753: 49-68, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.181757
